nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.transfertypes
Interface TransactionFeeServiceLocal

All Superinterfaces:
Service, TransactionFeeService
All Known Implementing Classes:
TransactionFeeServiceImpl
public interface TransactionFeeServiceLocal
extends TransactionFeeService

Local interface. It must be used only from other services.

Method Detail

buildTransfer

Transfer buildTransfer(BuildTransferWithFeesDTO params)
Returns a transfer representing the charging of this fee, if applied. The returned transfer is not persistent (has not been saved yet). The 'simulation' parameter is used by the preview() method to show to the user the fees that he will pay

preview

TransactionFeePreviewDTO preview(AccountOwner from,
                                 AccountOwner to,
                                 TransferType transferType,
                                 java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                 RatesResultDTO rates)
Previews which fees would be applied to a transaction of the given type and amount and rates. Use this one only in case of testing a transaction with different rates than set on the account. In all other cases, use the overloaded version.

Returns:
A Map where the key is the transaction fee and the value is the fee amount. The Object of the return type is an instance of TransactionFeePreviewForRatesDTO.
